events.comment: Change the animation according to what the player is doing.
events.comment2: On change l'animation en fonction de ce que fait le joueur.

events.comment: Player is on floor, did we just fall onto the floor (player is falling)?  If we did then shake the screen, but only if previous shake has finished (Shakey=0)
If player is going left flip the graphic, otherwise dont flip it.
Make sure the camera follows the player.
events.comment2: On s'assure que la caméra suit le joueur.
Gestion des collisions avec le joueur:
